mapper.select: select a.user_id ,a.birth_day ,a.about_img ,a.position ,a.sns_kind ,a.sns_url ,a.birth_day_yn , case when a.birth_day_yn = 'Y' then a.birth_day_about_img else '' end birth_day_about_img from ( select a.order_seq ,a.user_id ,a.birth_day ,a.birth_day_about_img ,a.position ,a.about_img ,b.sns_kind ,b.sns_url , case when substring(a.birth_day,6) = #{birthDay} then 'Y' when a.bitrh_day_test_yn = 'Y' then 'Y' else 'N' end birth_day_yn from member_list a left join sns_member_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id and b.use_yn='Y' where a.use_yn='Y' order by a.order_seq asc , b.order_seq asc ) a order by a.order_seq
select sns_kind ,sns_url from sns_corp_info where use_yn = 'Y' order by order_seq asc

SELECT a.user_id ,user_nm ,birth_day ,birth_day_img ,birth_day_icon ,'Y' as birth_day_yn ,a.position ,b.sns_kind ,b.sns_url FROM mydb.member_list a left join sns_member_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id and b.use_yn='Y' and b.sns_kind='instagram' where substring(birth_day,6) = #{birthDay} or bitrh_day_test_yn = 'Y'
